UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel cationic cryptides in Penaeus vannamei demonstrate antimicrobial and anti-cancer activities.
Literature.Author: Abd El-Aal AAA, Jayakumar FA, Lahiri C, Tan KO, Reginald K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:<10% Cell death=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 11774(MIC=1.56µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 11774(MBC=1.56µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MBC=12.5µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=3.12µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MBC=3.12µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=>50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MBC=>50µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MIC=>50µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MBC=>50µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MIC=25µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MFC=25µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(IC50=5.4±0.7µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(no activity data),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=8.8±1.1µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=10.8±0.3µM),Human neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y(no activity data),Human rhabdomyosarcoma(IC50=15±0.8µM)
